entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this morning. Rain beginning near noon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. High 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
